[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    INT   00000000_00000000_00000000_00101011 is converted into TFP   010_00010001_01100000
    FLOAT 00111110_10011001_10011001_10011010 is converted into TFP   001_11110100_11001100
    TFP   010_00010001_01100000 is converted into INT   00000000_00000000_00000000_00101011
    TFP   001_11110100_11001100 is converted into FLOAT 00111110_10011001_10000000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    010_00010001_01100000 + 001_11110100_11001100 = 010_00010001_01101010

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    010_00010001_01100000 * 001_11110100_11001100 = 010_00001010_01110010
